source.author: Jeanes, J.A.
source.title: Loranthaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Jeanes, J.A. (1999). Loranthaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Corolla in mature bud usually obtuse, 6-merous; peduncle usually 15–40 mm long; pedicels of lateral flowers usually 4–7 mm long; anthers mostly 5–9 mm long
Corolla in mature bud usually acute, 5-merous; peduncle usually 10–22 mm long; pedicels of lateral flowers usually 2–4 mm long; anthers mostly 2–4 mm long
